评论详情: This top is so much cuter than I thought it would be! It’s a very flattering cut, scoop neck, long sleeve and ribbed material.  The top is going to be great to dress up or dress down and is a great, functional wardrobe staple.  The material is moderately thick, probably good for fall and winter. May be too heavy for spring and summer wear. Super comfortable to for cooler weather.  Colors available are vibrant and bold. So far the colors have stayed bold and vibrant through a handful of washes. Have been washing just as I do other t shirts and they come out looking great.
Loved the fit. Soft and comfy
This is a great everyday shirt. The material is soft and it fits as expected.

I like the black and white stripes of this shirt. I order this shirt in a size larger. I even order this shirt in pink and white striped as well. I also like that it pairs well with my (SHEIN Sweater). I dislike the length of the shirt wish it could have been a little longer. The shirt is also not tummy friendly for someone who recently had a baby. Overall the shirt was a good buy for pair something over it.
Ran small definitely size up
This shirt fit great, TTS. I’m 5’8” with long arms so sometimes sleeves are too short. The sleeves on this shirt are great.
Great bit, great color, and great quality for the price. Will definitely order more.
This was one of those products that I didn't even need to try on before I knew it was going back. It looks so cheap.

This is one of my top favorite shirts.  The scoop neck like isn't too low and fits just right.  It is of great quality, soft, and stretchy.  I got the XL and it fits well, but I could have honestly size down one size and gotten an L to fit even better.  I have no complaints.  I love wearing this shirt.

I didn’t even open the packaging so I can’t comment on quality but the color is way off. The photo makes the shirt appear more purple/pink and light orange stripes but in reality the stripes are orange and blue. I returned right away.
This is the coziest top! I love the fit. True to size. I’m 155 and 5’7’ and the large fit me perfect! It’s long enough to wear with a cute puffer vest or do a front tuck! 10/10 would recommend.

I like the cut of this shirt, and it's not super thin the way some others have been. But the fabric feels a little stiff, and the fit is bigger than I expected. I usually wear a L, but I order XL in this style of shirt so they won't be skin tight. In other brands, that works out perfectly. With this one, however, I should have stuck with the L--the XL is too loose. So overall it's ok but not my favorite.
I love this shirt. The color is vibrant, great quality, and it's very comfortable so I ordered another one. It's not long in the length which I do prefer, but that's ok.
Definitely order a size up. This was TIGHT and uncomfortable. Super fitted. Maybe 2 sizes up would be more comfortable. Material is good and stripes are great.
This shirt is a very typical shirt. It goes well with jeans, but the shirt is not as comfortable as some of my other regular t-shirts. It's because I don't like how the fabric feels on my skin.

评论概述: Nice fitted casual but dress up t-shirt
评论详情: We have three of these shirts. They are fitted, therefore size up if you are well endowed. Love the shirt goes great with a jacket, cardigan or vest.
This is a high quality fabric with just the right amount of stretchiness. It is very true to size.
I am delighted with this purchase - the quality is more than I expected and I’ve had complimentary on how nice it looks. Enough said - I’m pleased

This striped shirt of very form fitting, so depending on how you feel about your body you will either love or hate this shirt. It is made well, has a good amount of stretch to it, and is a great value for the price. I found the top to be soft and flattering

评论概述: My New Favorite Shirt! Amazing! Flattering, Great Fabric & Fit & Colors. Ten Stars! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
评论详情: I bought one of every color of these striped shirts!! Very flattering. Fitted, but not too much. Nice curve in at the waist. Sleeve and shirt length are great, neck slightly scooped. Fabric is soft, not too thin, just the right weight. Very comfortable. They wash well without shrinkage. Just a few minutes the dryer, then hang dry the rest of the way. Size medium fit perfectly, I'm 5'7", 138 lbs. Perfect fit. I would have bought more colors if they had them. They can be dressed up or down. So happy I found these!! 👍😊

I bought one for my wife as a present as I always think that stripes look great on all women due to the curve appeal up top.  She is about 110 pounds and the small fit perfectly.  She loves it.  I’m going to get her another one in a different color.

Nice shirt. I like the fabric and colors are really nice, but I ordered per their bust measurements in their size size chart and the xl was way too big! I’m hoping I can shrink it since I had to wear ir. But in the right size it would be a great addition to anyone’s wardrobe.
This top runs small and material is more stretchy than cotton. I don’t normally like this material but I kept it. I did size up to a large and I’m 5’3 and 130 lbs.

评论概述: Fits great and is cute on!
评论详情: This shirt fits so much better than I was anticipating from Amazon. It’s cute, comfy and versatile enough to go with so many different outfits!
Love this cotton stretch top that is a wardrobe staple.  Attractive neckline, fitted, washable, carefree fabric .. will buy another as this is a hard-working top that is versatile.

Im between a S and M. I got the M based on measurements. The shirt is pretty long where the waist is going down. The arm sleeves fit perfectly. Not too loose but just right. Same with the shirt in general fits perfectly but like a t-shirt would if that makes sense? I think I'll get a small instead since I like it to be tighter around the chest area.

On the plus side, the colors of this shirt are pretty; the pink and lavender blend together nicely. The construction details are good. And the fabric is nice and soft.  On the negative, even though I knew this was a slim fit and ordered a full size larger than usual, I was surprised at how snugly it fits. The fabric is stretchy so it's comfortable but it does reveal every bulge.
This shirt is made well.  Fits great!  Looking to buy other colors!

I like the soft, stretchy ribbed fabric of this top, which fits me well and is long enough for my long torso. The material feels and looks like it is of high quality, and the top holds it's shape perfectly even after wearing all day-doesn't stretch out and get too saggy or loose. I like the neckline and the fit is great for me. A great staple item for my wardrobe, it can be worn with many different items from my closet and is cute. A good value for a quality top!
Very average shirt..it definitely runs a bit bigger than normal L..not sure if I'm going to keep it..guess u get what u pay for..

I wore the AUTOMET Women's Long Sleeve Striped T-Shirt to the office today under my black shirt, and it gave everyone major Beetlejuice vibes—I loved it! It was the perfect choice for a low-key Halloween outfit. The shirt is super comfortable and washes well, maintaining its shape and color after cleaning. While the sleeves are a bit long, I found it easy to fold them up for a more tailored look. The fabric is soft to the touch and made of good quality, making it a great addition to my fall wardrobe. Overall, I highly recommend this top for anyone looking for a trendy and fun outfit!

评论概述: The colors aren't exactly like the ones on the picture
评论详情: The colors are a little off compared to the pics, but still very nice~!~ The material is lightweight~stretchy and breathable~! Order the size you wear because the sizing is true. Its a good price for the quality of the top. I would recommend this top. Even though I'm not crazy about the new stripes trend but this shirt may have changed my mind~! 5 stars~!
Super comfy, soft, and quality is great!

Bought this for fall, it is long-sleeved but a lighter material with good stretch and a nice ribbed texture.  The blue color looks same as advertised and I like the longer sleeve that I folded back.  It's cute with jeans and boots.  It has a nice neckline that is not too high or too scooped.

评论概述: Good quality shirt and very stretchy
评论详情: Comfortable, fits great, not too tight, the shirt is soft and not itchy, stretches very nicely and is true to size, the quality is good, the pattern is like the photo, I will be using this for a Halloween costume of bank robber to “match” my child who will be a police officer
Was not as pictured.  Was more orange and cream colored.  Kept it anyway,  but would have preferred the colors on photos.  Otherwise like the texture and quality.

I bought this in several different colors  I’m always a size medium. The black and white and blue and white fit perfectly but all the other ones were way too tight. Sent those back and ordered size large and they fit like a medium. I love the feel of these shirts just be aware they are not sized correctly.

What I love about this shirt is that it is long enough in the torso and sleeves.  I got it in a large - the size I usually wear in slim fit tops - and it seems true to size.  I like that it has substantial cotton content along with the stretch.  Just have to be careful with it in the wash not to shrink the cotton fibers!

What a great price for such a high quality top! It has a nice amount of stretch, it’s true to size, and it’s structured and pretty. I’m glad I purchased three! The colors are exactly as the photograph shows.

评论概述: Very Nice Top for Fall! Thicker than a T-Shirt
评论详情: This is a very nice top. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the actual shirt is nicer than the advertised description and photos suggest. The title refers to this as a t-shirt, it isn't. It's a thicker ribbed top that would be ideal for early fall or spring, or under a sweater/thicker top in winter. The material exceeded my expectations in terms of quality as it is soft and comfortable. It is formfitting (with long sleeves), but it isn't overly tight. I would say that the fit is true-to-size or that this runs slightly large. I would suggest sizing down if you're between sizes and would like this to be form-fitting.I ordered this in a small. For reference, I'm 5'4, 135 lbs. My measurements are 35" bust (34D bra), 25" waist, 35" hips. I typically wear a US size 4 in tops and 4P in pants. I highly recommend this top and plan to order additional colors in the future. I hope this is helpful!

评论概述: Fabric is rough, maybe not cotton?
评论详情: This shirt does look like the pictures. Although it is advertised as cotton and spandex, and the tag says the same, it seems to have another fabric. Its texture is rough, and the fabric itself is not very soft. As others have said, the arm pits are long. But I wouldn't say it's not true to size. I ordered a size small, and the torso width fit my daughter who is usually a size small. The armpits hung a little low, but it didn't look bad. She is only 12, so she didn't notice the low arm pits. She really likes this shirt. It is cute on her. I took off a star because it's not soft and I suspect not entirely cotton as advertised.
Super cute. Good quality.  Runs small.

This is a woman's cut and fits as it should.  A size small will fit up to a 130lbs woman.  The fabric is stretchy and conforms to your body.  The collar area is rounded to show off your jewelry.  The stripes are solid and would look good with a sailor outfit for Halloween if you get the navy blue with white stripes.  This is an easy care garment, that i would machine wash and dry.  The length is good not too long.

Review for AUTOMET Womens Long Sleeve Striped T-Shirts Scoop Neck Tops Slim Fit Fall Fashion Trendy Outf  This is a very bright blue and white striped shirt. We thought it would be more navy but it is bright royal blue. It is a very soft material that has a nice stretch. Overall she likes this shirt. She thinks it will look really cute with jeans and sneakers for a casual look.  Good price at about $15 when we got it.
I like the feel of this fabric and it’s flattering. I’m 5”3 and ordered an XL, so the arms were long on me but they fold over well. It’s a flattering shirt and a good value, nice quality.

The size chart depicted a Medium as being a 33 bust - three inches small for me! However, I am a solid Medium across the board. Rather than going with the recommended Large, I took a chance on the Medium. It fits perfectly.
I adore this shirt and legit have gotten a million compliments on it. The fit is true to size. The quality is fantastic and I adore the blue and white stripes. 5 stars!
I love this shirt. It's very comfortable and breathable and has a cool longer length for layering! My new favorite!

评论概述: I received exactly what I thought I ordered.
评论详情: Love it! Got exactly what I wanted. I’m a small but a lot of small tops fit skin tight. This one isn’t loose but it’s not skin tight and I love that.
Even though it stretches, the fit is on the small side.  An XXL would be a bit better for if offered
This shirt is cut to best fit a tall and thin person.  I am only 5’4” so the sleeves on the size small ran long even after washing. The stripes do not line up along the seems, if that matters to you.

This is a nice, light, cotton shirt that is super soft and comfortable. Very true to size, and is long enough to pull over your hands for extra warmth (mt favortie part) The coloring is nice, and the fabric is a bit textured which adds a nice touch. Great shirt for Spring or Fall when the weather is a bit unpredictable.

评论概述: Beautiful shirt, well-made with smooth interior seams.
评论详情: Lovely striped scoop neck T shirt. Very fashion forward and trendy. Perfect for back to school for my 13 year old daughter.
GREAT fit and even better price!

I love that this shirt has some length to it. Most things these days are oversized or cropped. It’s one extreme to the other. This is perfectly in the middle. The material is soft and has the perfect amount of stretch. It has a nice fitted look without being too tight. It’s also true to size and washes/dries well. Quality matches the price point! I’d recommend to anyone in need!

评论概述: What you see is what you get
评论详情: Simple and straight to the point, the blue is royal blue. The fit is accurate, it is fitted and it does have some length to the sleeves. There is some stretch and the material isn't extremely thin, this can hold up and last for a while even with constant wash and wear. The quality, fit and material reminds me of what was worn back in the day

This top is cute & probably runs true to size—I’m not sure though. I’m usually an extra small so I got this with the intention of shrinking it in the dryer lol, since it’s supposedly made out of cotton & spandex. It did shrink a little, which is great, but it’s still loose under my armpits. I feel that if I was an actual small, it would still be loose under my armpits…I deducted a star for that. I also feel like the shirt might have some polyester in it (even though the tag says cotton & spandex) because it’s rough even after washing & drying. I’m probably not going to be wearing this out in public because of the aforementioned loose fabric under the armpits, so will just wear around the house.
i absolutely love this top. it fits just right and makes my waist look so good. it is fitted so keep that in mind when ordering. the material is so soft and quality. i will be getting this again!

评论概述: Soft, Pretty, But Size Chart Might be Off
评论详情: This top has some good features, but it fell short for me in sizing and the fit. The fabric is a nice, lightweight blend that feels comfortable and breathes well, making it suitable for layering or wearing on its own. The colors are true to the online pictures. I love the pink and blue scheme.  However, the fit in the chest is quite off for me. It’s noticeably loose across the chest and armpits, which is unusual for a shirt that’s supposed to be fitted. It’s a shame because the overall design and quality are decent. I followed the size chart when ordering, but it may be the case that I need a smaller size. I’d recommend trying on more than one size and returning the one that doesn’t fit. You may need a size smaller than what’s written on the chart.

Cute shirt! The colors were nice, though I’d say the “pink” is more orange-y/peach than a true pink when it comes to the pink&blue shirt. I do like the texture of the shirt though. Very comfy to wear! It’s something different than all the neutrals I have in my closet. I also made the mistake of ordering a size larger, thinking it was super form fitting and it isn’t that kind of fit. I wish I would’ve gotten my true size (medium) vs the large that I got, BUT it still fits and looks nice. It just has more fabric in the underarm part of the shirt, but I can make it work. I do like that this shirt has more length than most these days and the sleeves were plenty long. All in all, a great fun add to my wardrobe!
Really cute!! Fits true to size.

Love this. I'm into stripes and Breton lately and I love this top. It's a nice weave that stretches but doesn't get all wonky after wearing it a day. I man, elbows aren't all baggy, stuff like that. It's breathable, which is great because it's long sleeved and I'm wearing this in summer. I've gotten compliments on it, too, which is nice. It's literally a long sleeve T, but it reads as elevated. Literally no price difference, but way better perception. Good investment in a wardrobe.

This pullover is a basic top for casual wear. It is an easy care blend, machine washed and dried well, very soft and lightweight. I wear it alone on warm/slightly cool days. Looks cute with a pair of light jeans and sneakers.

I love the style and fit of the shirt. Very capsule wardrobe type shirt. It’s a thin net that holds your body but not too much. It’s the nice medium length that it could be tucked in or untucked. Super comfortable I like the neckline as well with the sweeping scoop. It washed and dried on regular cycle without any ill affects. Highly recommend.

This shirt is really cute and practical. The material isn’t too thick, but the sleeves are long so it makes it pretty versatile. The price is great, and I love that it could be worn, dressed up or dressed down. It would be adorable with a blazer and jeans or sweatpants for a casual day.

评论概述: Fits true to size and matches picture
评论详情: I normally don’t gravitate to stripes, but this piece has a timeless feel to it. The fabric feels great on the skin and I can tell it will last for more than a few seasons! I am looking forward to wearing it in the fall.
